quest.name: Live off the Land
journal: Emory is preparing for a new business venture.
objectives: Survey the designated location and slay any migrating crag claws that appear.

dialogue.name: EMORY
dialogue.text: Hey, you're that adventurer everyone's talkin' about. The one what helped the Resistance. I could use a strong set o' hands like yours, assumin' you're up for it o' course.

dialogue.name: EMORY
dialogue.text: For as long as I can remember, I've been runnin' my father's business here in Ala Ghiri. Wouldn't sell to those imperial bastards, though. I'm not too proud o' the things I had to do, but we got by.

dialogue.name: EMORY
dialogue.text: Now that they're gone, we can get back to doin' proper work. More than that, I can finally get to farmin' like I'd always dreamed of.

dialogue.name: EMORY
dialogue.text: Only trouble is, the spot o' land I had in mind's overrun with crags. I'll make it worth your while if you could go and clear 'em out.

dialogue.name: EMORY
dialogue.text: Here, I'll mark it on your map. Take a look aroundâ”€you'll know 'em when you see 'em.

dialogue.name: EMORY
dialogue.text: Those crags are a nasty bit o' business, but I'm sure an adventurer like you can handle 'em.

dialogue.name: EMORY
dialogue.text: So they're gone? Well done, lasslad, well done!

dialogue.name: EMORY
dialogue.text: The land's not in the best o' shape, but I'll make do. Aye, I'll fix it up so folks can work the land an' get back on their feet. Too many have lost their homes, an' loved ones...

dialogue.name: EMORY
dialogue.text: Ahem. Don't get the wrong impression, lasslad. More folks workin' the land means more profits for my business is all.

dialogue.name: EMORY
dialogue.text: If it helps people make a better livin', well, that's more incentive to get started, now isn't it?
